entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Elliot Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:09 AM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or flurries ending late this morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating late this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 2. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
